title: Fort Frederica National Monument: Plan Your Visit
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit           Plan Your Visit      Film The 23 minute film "History Uncovered" is shown in the visitor center theatre every 30 minutes from 9:00 am - 4:30 pm.  Programs Ranger programs are offered daily based on staff availability.   Please call ahead for group reservations.   Ranger Led Tours/Programs need to be scheduled at least two weeks in advance. Available FacilitiesVisitor Center has a bookstore, drink machines, and restroom facilities. Parking lot has an area for buses and RVs and a picnic area.           Visit the Bloody Marsh Unit of Fort Frederica National Monument           Plan a Field Trip to Fort Frederica
